name: QA 1715
description:
PCP QA Test No. 1715

Exercises pmdastatsd

- hdr histogram aggregation on duration metrics

Since agent works with UDP datagrams, we have to take into account

that not all payloads will get processed and some will get lost.

Following test assumes that at least 10% of datagrams get processed

and measured values are within 35% +/- of expected values



Copyright (c) 2020 Red Hat.
